install.name: Font Size Changer
install.author: UnDesign
install.description:
This font resizer module changes font sizes site-wide.

Make sure you use PERCENTAGES for your font sizes or fonts will not resize.

Don't forget to publish the module! (go to Extensions/Module Manager/Font Size Changer)

You can set the default percentage of the font size (default is 100%).

The module uses a cookie to remember the user's preferred font size.

param.name: defaultSize
param.label: Default Font Size %
param.description: The default size of your font is 100%.

param.name: useImg
param.label: Use Images for buttons?
param.description: This will use images/buttons instead of text for the controls. Images will not resize.
